item.title: Intuitive Explanations Make You Dizzyingly Smart
item.description: You’re not stupid. Gullible, probably. Delusional? Well, obviously. I mean you’re on this website designed for misfit derelicts, which clearly indicates that there’s something very wrong with you. Yet I don’t think you’re stupid. Because as long as you have the ability to learn, you cannot possibly be stupid. Your ability to learn is what makes you more powerful (and in a lot of cases, more irrational) than any other animal on this planet.
